name: Walk The Odyssey
description:
Walk The Odyssey! 

Explore the world of Odysseus and the Odyssey, encounter monsters, and fight your way to victory, all while exploring your own neighborhood! In this fun mobile game, explore your neighborhood with your crew and find the monsters at the end of your journey, while doing your best to keep all your crew members alive. Will you take on the journey? 

Noah Kuhn: Gamplay/Systems Design, Programming, UI/UX

Alex Hanlin: Gamplay/Systems Design, Programming

Marin Clark: Art

Will Sords: Audio, UI/UX

Melody Geiger: Animations, Worldbuilding, UI/UX
